name: Holy Quran random verse Multilanguage
author: Bahmed Karim

sections.description:
to fix error “quran_random block was affected by errors and may not function properly.”
just install and active plugin classic widgets

Holy Quran random verse widget is translated into 24 languages.

Vous pouvez maintenant écouter le verset avec 5 recitateurs au choix(you can now listen to the verse with 5 reciters choice)

  • arabe
  • english
  • français
  • allemand
  • dutch
  • russe
  • albanian
  • azerbaijani
  • bengali
  • bosnian
  • bulgarian
  • chinese
  • czech
  • indonesian
  • italian
  • kurdish
  • malay
  • norwegian
  • portuguese
  • romanian
  • somali
  • spanish
  • swedish

  • turkish

  • ce plugin peut être associé à (this plugin can be associated with) Quran Text Multilanguage

  • demo page
sections.installation:
1. Upload quran-multilanguage-widget to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to de widget
